how to train,test and validate the feed forward neural network for 3 input nodes and 2 output nodes

i m having a data set as shown below, how to train,test and validate the feed forward neural network for same data. input data [ 0 0 0; 0 22.9183 0; 0 45.8366 0; 0 68.7549 0; 22.9183 0 0; 22.9183 22.9183 0; 22.9183 45.8366 0; 22.9183 68.7549 0; 45.8366 0 0; 45.8366 22.9183 0; 45.8366 45.8366 0; 45.8366 68.7549 0; 68.7549 0 0; 68.7549 22.9183 0; 68.7549 45.8366 0; 68.7549 68.7549 0; 91.6732 0 0; 91.6732 22.9183 0; 91.6732 45.8366 0; 91.6732 68.7549 0] output data [405.0000 0; 390.8699 69.7059; 350.7105 128.4067; 290.8620 166.8350; 373.0297 157.7144; 332.8703 216.4153; 273.0218 254.8435; 202.9331 266.9322; 282.1662 290.5292; 222.3178 328.9575; 152.2290 341.0462; 82.9654 324.8867; 146.7549 377.4758; 76.6661 389.5645; 7.4026 373.4051; -50.1006 331.5487; -11.8258 404.8273; -81.0894 388.6679; -138.5926 346.8115; -175.2569 285.8665]
